content.rendered: Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars 110 ratings

excerpt.rendered:
This is a Vegetarian product.
Package contains- Cureveda Herbal Women Elixir 450ml Syrup
Ingredients- Ashoka, Lodhra, Nagkeshar
Ashoka: It is used for women’s problem and controls menorrhagia (excessive flow) dysmenorrhea (Abdominal pain), menorrhagia (Irregular output).
Helps to regularize monthly cycle and related issues like abdominal pain, loss of appetite, mood swings, burning sensation & backache.
Dosage- Take 3 teaspoonfuls with half a cup of water twice a day, after lunch and dinner. Continue up to 3 months for best results.

Helps to regularize monthly cycle and related issues like abdominal pain, loss of appetite, mood swings, burning sensation & backache. Dosage- Take 3 teaspoonfuls with half a cup of water twice a day, after lunch and dinner. Continue up to 3 months for best results.
